newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Belmont Homes cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Belmont Homes cut.

text.p: -- Rauscher Pierce Refsnes Inc said it downgraded Belmont Homes to market performer from market outperformer.

-- said the outlook for the manufactured housing industry remains positive with a 1997 forecast of 11 percent growth in multi-section units, four percent decline in single sections, for a totoal unit growth of five percent.
-- said Belmont has put into place several strategies to shift its product mix into higher growth areas. This transition will take place throughout 1997.
